description:
More layers of mystery are peeled away as Tsubasa`s health worsens. Why did she kill her husband? Why does Energer Z look just like Mazinger Z? But even on death`s door, Tsubasa has a card up her sleeve!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grudge! The longest Day of the Kurogane House (Middle Part)
Ikon! Kuroganeya no Ichiban Nagai Hi (Chuuhen)
¡Rencor! ¡El día más largo de la Mansión Kurogane! (2ª Parte)
遺恨! くろがね屋の一番長い日 (中編)
